## Mutation Strategy {#mutation}

### Possible Planting Formations {#planting}

Kee has a chance of mutating when [[Berries/Liechi]] and [[Berries/Ganlon]] are touching an empty plot. You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Kee Berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.

:::collapsed Kee Mutation - Farm Simulator Code
Copy & paste the line below into the [[Farm Simulator]]'s Import from Text.

``
:::
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: |
| [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | |
| {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | |
| {.mutation} | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | |
| [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | |
| {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | |
:::

Alternatively, you can use [[Berries/Kebia]] to get better mutation chances. Be sure to remove it once you are done mutating Kee.

:::collapsed Kee Mutation w/ Kebia- Farm Simulator Code
Copy & paste the line below into the [[Farm Simulator]]'s Import from Text.

``
:::
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: |
| {.mutation} | [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | {.mutation} | |
| [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | |
| {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Kebia.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kebia]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | |
| [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | |
| {.mutation} | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Liechi.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Liechi]] | {.mutation} | |
:::
Note: Ganlon and Liechi berries have equivalent growth times.
